transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello, very good afternoon Pradeep sir.

Customer: Haanji.

Executive: Pradeep sir IndiaMART Noda office se Jinsi Thomas.

Customer: Ji, boliye.

Executive: Aapke concern ke regarding aap IndiaMART ka platform se kuch lead aapka relevant nahi mil pa rahe, correct hai?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: To isi ke bihaf mein abhi Neha ne aap se baat kiya hai na?

Customer: Hmm, ek minute.

Executive: Sir dekho jo acting aapko video meeting ka through bhi sara cheez dikhaya, lead construction part hai, kis tarah se aap use kar rahe hain, sara cheez dikhaya hai na?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: To aap mujhe batayenge aur hamare end se kya help ka required hai?

Customer: Hame bas lead de dijiye Assam ka B2B lead jo ki mil nahi pa raha hai. Theek hai? Bas itna hi help hamare liye kafi hai.

Executive: Ji matlab aapko recent wala lead aur bulk mein chahiye, correct hai?

Customer: Recent wala lead nahi, recent wala B2B lead. B2B lead chahiye hame, B2B lead nahi mil pa raha hai.

Executive: Abhi bhi dekhiye sir to e-rickshaw and West Bengal ka bhi lead hai, 100 pieces ka required hai.

Customer: Sir, Assam ka hame B2B lead chahiye.

Executive: Haan, abhi abhi recent wala lead ek baar dekhiye, West Bengal ka bhi lead hai.

Executive: Aur e-rickshaw battery ka bhi lead available hai. Uttar Pradesh ka bhi lead available hai. And e-rickshaw lithium battery ka lead available hai.

Customer: Assam, Assam ke lead ke bare mein baat kar raha hu. Theek hai? Assam ke lead ke bare mein baat kar raha hu.

Executive: Achha, aapko Assam ka lead zyada chahiye?

Customer: Haan, haan. Alag alag zone bata hua hai, to Assam ke lead se mujhe matlab hai. Mujhe Assam ki B2B lead chahiye. Assam ki B2B leads nahi mil rahi hai. Theek hai? Hafte mein ek do agar milti hai to milti hai, warna nahi milti hai.

Executive: To hamara Assam, Guwahati in jagah pe aur aapka lead purchase pattern dekho, yaha pe ek options hai. Aap to bahut purana customer IndiaMART ka platform hai. Jaise aap India filter karke create filter mein jaake aap apna state filter mein kara dijiyega Assam, Guwahati, jo area aapko filter lagana hai, wo filter laga dijiyega. Automatically aapko Assam ka lead mil hi jayega.

Customer: Are automatically, itna din se kaam kar rahe hain, itna pata nahi hoga kya?

Executive: Maine abhi jaise Assam filter lagaya, theek hai? Assam filter lagane se bhi jo e-rickshaw and electrical Guwahati ka lead available hai. 19 ghante ka pehle bhi Guwahati ka electrical auto rickshaw ka lead Assam ka lead available hai. Jaise maine filter lagaya. Aapka number pe main screen share kar du?

Executive: Jaise maine filter laga ke kya kiya ek baar.

Customer: 19 ghante pehle ki baat hai na?

Executive: Ji?

Customer: Kitne der pehle ki baat kar rahe hain aap?

Executive: Abhi matlab hai recent lead to nahi hai abhi. 19 ghante ka pehle, 22 ghante ka pehle aur 5 minute ka pehle bhi lead hai. Bajaj rickshaw ka lead Nagaon, Assam ka lead available hai.

Customer: 19 ghante pehle hai na? 19 ghante pehle, 21 ghante pehle, 22 ghante pehle. 19 ghante pehle. Main mujhe recent lead ki baat nahi hai, mujhe lead chahiye, B2B lead chahiye jo ki nahi mil rahi hai. Mera problem yahi hai. Jo bhi leads aa rahi hai, ye dekhiye members since one month, yaani ki ye sare retail leads hai. Theek hai? Most probably ye sare retail leads nikalte hain ya phir maan lijiye kuch kuch search karte karte IndiaMART khul gaya to wo sare leads hai. In leads ka main kya karu? B2C ka leads ka main kya karu? Mujhe B2B ka ki lead chahiye.

Executive: Minimum order quantity aapka expectation kya hai? Maan lo aapka ek bhi product hai to lakh rupaye ke upar hai. Agar electrical e-rickshaw ek bhi hai to bhi matlab lakh rupaye ke upar hai. To abhi bhi ye Assam 5 minute ka pehle Assam Nagaon ka lead available hai. 5 Bajaj rickshaw requirement hai. Seating capacity six hai, more than one year hai. Ek baar inquiry se aap baat karo, ye 5 minute ka pehle ka lead hai. Maine aapko screen share kar diya.

Customer: Jabardasti baat karwana chahte ho to main baat karta hu, line pe ruko.

Executive: Ji baat kara dijiye.

Customer: Main bol raha hu retail leads mujhe nahi chahiye.

Executive: Aap keh rahe retail lead, wahi se retail lead.

Executive: Dekho order quantity pe hum ye bhi commitment nahi kar payenge hai na, aapko 100% bulk lead mil payega. Jo portal mein 100% lead direct inquiry catalog view calls each and every day different from market hai. Theek hai? Agar market mein jo available hai, main wahi aapko provide kara paungi na. Aapka industry mein itna competitive hai. Is competitive ke hisab se main aapko.

Customer: Pehle to pehle to leads milte the hame. Ab kyun nahi mil rahi hai?

Executive: Sir pehle bhi ye milta tha, pehle bhi aapka paas complaint tha. Aise nahi aapne pehle complaint nahi kiya. Aapne pehle bhi complaint kiya tha, pehle bhi aapka complaint the. Kab kab? Last complaint kab ka hai?

Executive: Last aapka jo continue aapko pata hai aapka October mein bhi concern aaya tha, isse pehle September mein bhi concern aaya tha.

Customer: Aa raha hai, aa raha hai complaint. Ye pichle do teen mahine, teen char mahine se leads hame nahi mil rahi hai Assam ki. Isse pehle bhi IndiaMART ka platform hum use kar rahe the na?

Executive: Dekho sir, July mein bhi aapne concern raise kiya tha, aapne June mein bhi concern raise kiya tha, April mein bhi concern raise kiya tha, aapne March mein bhi concern raise kiya tha. Aise nahi aapne ek mahine mein aapne concern raise nahi kiya. Ab har mahine aapka concern hai, yahi problem hai. Tabhi bhi main aapko.

Customer: Har mahine concern raise kiya gaya? Ek second, ek second. Har mahine concern raise kiya gaya hai?

Executive: Ji sir, aapka har mahine open ticket aapka matlab open hota hai.

Customer: Aap screenshot dikhao, kaha se kaise complaint raise kiya gaya hai?

Executive: Screenshot nahi hai, aapka main ticket ID bata deti hu. Main mahina hi bata deti hu. Theek hai? Jo jo lead hai, jo bhi complaint hai. Complaint aana dekho isme koi buri baat nahi hai. Aap apna problem bata rahe hain, aapne package IndiaMART ka to registered hai. Is package ke bihaf pe aapko business nahi mil pa raha, yahi aapka concern hai. I agree with you.

Customer: Main dekhiye, hum log hamare aur bhi other states hai, Bihar hai ya aur bhi Bihar se achhe khase response aa rahi hai. Theek hai? Bihar ke liye main hum hamare taraf se complaint raise nahi kiya gaya hai. Bihar mein thik thak leads mil rahi hai. Theek hai? West Bengal mein leads mil rahi hai. Lekin hame Assam ki leads chahiye, Assam se nahi mil raha hai lead. Agar Assam ki leads hame nahi milega to hum kaise marketing karenge?

Executive: Haan Pradeep sir, abhi aapka point hai aapke IndiaMART ka platform se Bihar se bhi mil rahe hain aur other states se mil rahe hain, aapko Assam ki concern hai. To ek kaam karna sir, dekho product bechne click karke, theek hai? Aap product ke category mein jaake ek baar click karke aap Assam ka combination kuch zyada hi choose kara dijiyega. Theek hai? Aapne Guwahati mein ek lithium-ion battery Guwahati mein ek rakha hai aapne. Aur phir next aapka ek hi category hai. Next category electrical loader Guwahati hai, e-rickshaw loader Guwahati hai. Teen category aapne Guwahati mein mapping kar rakha hai. Theek hai? Agar aap chahe to Guwahati mein aur Assam ka jitna bhi state mein aap highly focus karana, us area mein zyada aapne star package aap combination change kara dijiyega. Combination to aapko malum hai na kis tarah se combination change karana hai?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: To is tarah se ek baar karke dekho taki aapka jaldi combination aap kabhi bhi aap apna hisab se redirection karana ka permission hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Sir, is tarah se ek aur tarike se dekhta hu. Haan, wo wo bhi tarike se dekhta hu. Neha mam se baat ho rahi thi, ye kar lo, wo kar lo, isme lead badh jayega, usme lead badh jayega. Par abhi tak leads nahi mil rahi hai. Jab tak leads nahi milega to phir kyun phir is platform ko use kare?

Executive: Sir dekho ye number aap save kar lijiyega. My name is Jinsi Thomas sir. Aapka to mera number ek date kya naam hai? Kya naam hai aapka? Jinsi Thomas. Aap Pradeep sir baat kar rahe hain na?

Customer: Nahi, mera naam Shubham hai.

Executive: Achha Shubham ji, maine bhi aap se kitni baar baat kiya tha. Anuj ka time hai. Anuj jab aapka call manager karta, maine Anuj ka sath mein bhi maine kai baar baat kiya tha. Aur ek aur sir.

Customer: Aapki baat mere se kabhi bhi nahi hui thi. Anuj se hui thi baat. Anuj ke baad phir Neha se ho rahi hai.

Executive: Achha Anuj ka manager mein bhi thi, Neha ki manager mein bhi thi. Aap ek kaam kar lijiye, isi number pe main aapko WhatsApp connect kar leti hu. Theek hai? Kabhi bhi koi bhi dikkat ho, dekho business to aapko IndiaMART se karna hai, hame business aapko dena hai. Theek hai? Aapka bhi aur hum dono ka bhi ek hi tyar hai, aap business.

Executive: To business development karne ke liye aap apna ye jo bhi ho concern hame batayenge taki main apna right to way mein issue sort out karaenge. Taki koi bhi lead aise nahi generate nahi kara payenge. Aise IndiaMART employee ke taraf se koi lead generate nahi hota hai. Leads IndiaMART ka portal se jo buyer generate karate hain. Us hisab se hum aapko mapping karaenge, us hisab se aapko combination change karaenge.

Executive: Theek hai Shubham sir?

Executive: Aap ek baar hai na ye combination se seller panel mein product bechne click kara ke combination aapko Guwahati, Assam ka state mein zyada mention kara dijiyega. Taki Delhi ka hata ke, Patna ka hata ke, taki jaldi combination se jaldi combination mein sabse zyada aapko Assam aur Assam ki state mein chahiye to Guwahati aur Nagaon ye sab jaha pe Siliguri jin jin cities se aapko Assam ka lead chahiye, usi state mein aap apna combination zyada ka zyada use kijiyega.

Executive: Tab ek hafte dekhenge, is ek hafte ke andar phir hame pata chalega kitna kitna lead generate ho rahe hain. Correct hai?

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: To abhi dekho problem to aapka hi haath mein hi sort out karna hai aur mere haath mein hi. Maine aapko suggest kiya aap is tarah se ek baar karke dekho taki usme issue sort out karaenge. Main aapka number WhatsApp kara deti hu. Dekhiye main jis number se main baat kar rahi hu ek baar ek baar hai na WhatsApp pe hi de deti hu Shubham ka.

Customer: Shubham kya hai?

Executive: Jinsi Thomas.

Customer: Jinsi Thomas?

Executive: Haanji, Jinsi Thomas.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Abhi main aapko hai na ek baar WhatsApp pe hi de deti hu. Theek hai? Aap meri number save kar lijiyega. Theek hai? Koi bhi concern hai to aap mujhe bhi direct baat kar sakte hain. Theek hai? Kyunki Pradeep sir se meri baat hote rehta hai aur jo ek aur sir bhi tha aapka partner tha na. Jo marketing head tha.

Customer: Hmm. Aap Shubham sir aur ek aur marketing sir tha na?

Customer: Nahi, Shubham naam se main hi hu.

Executive: Achha, theek hai. Sir, haan, theek hai, main aapko ye number save kar lo. Dekho isme ticket open karke hold karte isme koi fayda nahi hai. Issue matlab koi aapka relevant solution nahi hai. Yahi hamara guide aapko karana hai. Aap experienced hai IndiaMART ka platform mein kis tarah se use karana hai, kya karana hai. Theek hai? Main aapko WhatsApp number share kara di. Within permission main ye concern main abhi band kar du?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Theek hai? Main abhi aapko WhatsApp number share kara deti hu. Theek hai?

Customer: Haan. Yes.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants Assam B2B leads, not receiving them.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads.

- Frustrated with the lack of B2B leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to filter leads by state.

- Suggested focusing on specific Assam locations.

- Offered to share her WhatsApp number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try the suggested filtering method.

- Follow up in a week to check lead generation.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, b2b, assam, filtering, support
